FooterSection.description: The all-in-one platform for social media management. Create, schedule, and analyze your content with AI assistance.

ai.title: AI Content Generation
ai.description: Transform your content creation with cutting-edge AI technology. Generate engaging captions, hashtags, and full posts in seconds while maintaining your unique brand voice.
ai.benefitsHeading: What you can do with AI Content Generation
ai.benefitsSubheading: Unlock powerful capabilities to streamline your content workflow
ai.howItWorksSubheading: Start creating amazing content in four simple steps

steps.title: Choose Your Content Type
steps.description: Select the type of content you want to create - whether it's a social post, caption, hashtags, or a complete campaign.

steps.title: Provide Context
steps.description: Give the AI some context about your brand, target audience, and the message you want to convey.

steps.title: Generate & Refine
steps.description: Let AI generate multiple variations and refine them to match your style perfectly with our intuitive editor.

steps.title: Publish or Schedule
steps.description: Once satisfied, publish immediately or schedule your AI-generated content for optimal engagement times.

ai.ctaHeading: Ready to supercharge your content creation?
ai.ctaSubheading: Join thousands of creators using AI to produce better content faster.

schedule.title: Intelligent Post Scheduling
schedule.description: Schedule your content at the perfect time for maximum engagement. Our smart scheduling algorithm analyzes your audience behavior to recommend optimal posting times across all platforms.
schedule.benefitsSubheading: Maximize your reach with intelligent timing
schedule.howItWorksSubheading: Automate your posting schedule for better results

steps.title: Analyze Audience Behavior
steps.description: Our system analyzes when your audience is most active across different platforms and time zones.

steps.title: Create Your Content Queue
steps.description: Build a queue of posts that will be automatically scheduled at optimal times based on our recommendations.

steps.title: Set Posting Preferences
steps.description: Customize posting frequency, time windows, and platform-specific preferences to match your strategy.

steps.title: Auto-Publish & Monitor
steps.description: Sit back while your content publishes automatically, and monitor performance in real-time from your dashboard.

schedule.ctaHeading: Never miss the perfect posting time
schedule.ctaSubheading: Let our smart scheduling handle your content calendar while you focus on creating.

analytics.title: Advanced Analytics & Reporting
analytics.description: Get deep insights into your social media performance with comprehensive analytics. Track engagement, reach, audience demographics, and ROI across all your platforms in one unified dashboard.
analytics.benefitsSubheading: Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive insights

steps.title: Connect Your Accounts
steps.description: Link all your social media accounts to start collecting performance data automatically.

steps.title: Track Key Metrics
steps.description: Monitor engagement rates, reach, impressions, follower growth, and other important KPIs in real-time.

steps.title: Generate Reports
steps.description: Create custom reports with the metrics that matter most to you and your stakeholders.

steps.title: Optimize Your Strategy
steps.description: Use insights to identify what works, double down on successful content, and improve your overall performance.

analytics.ctaSubheading: Get the insights you need to grow your social media presence effectively.

team.title: Team Collaboration Tools
team.description: Work seamlessly with your team or clients. Assign roles, manage approval workflows, and collaborate on content creation all in one centralized platform.
team.benefitsSubheading: Collaborate efficiently with powerful team features
team.howItWorksSubheading: Manage your team and workflows effectively

steps.title: Invite Team Members
steps.description: Add team members and assign specific roles with customized permissions for secure collaboration.

steps.title: Create Approval Workflows
steps.description: Set up multi-level approval processes to ensure content quality and brand consistency before publishing.

steps.title: Collaborate on Content
steps.description: Use internal comments, feedback tools, and shared asset libraries to work together seamlessly.

steps.title: Track Team Activity
steps.description: Monitor team contributions, approval status, and workflow efficiency with detailed activity logs.

team.ctaSubheading: Scale your social media operations with powerful collaboration tools.

publish.title: Multi-Platform Publishing
publish.description: Publish to all major social networks from one central dashboard. Save time, ensure consistency, and reach your entire audience across Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, LinkedIn, and more.
publish.benefitsSubheading: Reach your audience wherever they are

steps.title: Create Your Content
steps.description: Write your post once using our universal composer with support for text, images, videos, and links.

steps.title: Optimize Per Platform
steps.description: Our system automatically adjusts your content for each platform's specifications and best practices.

steps.title: Preview Before Publishing
steps.description: See exactly how your post will look on each platform before you hit publish.

steps.title: Publish Instantly
steps.description: Push your content to all selected platforms simultaneously or schedule for different times per platform.

publish.ctaSubheading: Save hours every week by managing all your platforms in one place.

rtl.title: Full RTL Language Support
rtl.description: Complete support for right-to-left languages including Arabic, Hebrew, Persian, and Urdu. Our platform adapts the entire interface and content flow for perfect RTL experience.
rtl.howItWorksSubheading: Seamless experience in your preferred language

steps.title: Select Your Language
steps.description: Choose your preferred RTL language from our settings, and the entire interface adapts automatically.

steps.title: Create RTL Content
steps.description: Our editor fully supports RTL text editing with proper character flow and formatting.

steps.title: Preview in RTL
steps.description: See how your content will appear on social platforms with accurate RTL rendering.

steps.title: Publish with Confidence
steps.description: Your RTL content publishes perfectly to all platforms with proper text direction and formatting.

rtl.ctaSubheading: Manage your Arabic social media with a platform built for your language.
